alert.note: Alert for Ottawa (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 5:50PM EDT until July 20 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM EDT FOR OTTAWA COUNTY... At 550 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles north of Port Clinton, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Port Clinton, Kelleys Island, Put-In-Bay, Catawba Island and Marblehead. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
